title: Compare: Results display with pass/fail state
description: Display the comparison results showing overall pass/fail status, delta score, and the breakdown of regressions, improvements, and unchanged cases.
acceptance_criteria: Large header banner showing pass/fail state
Section headers for Regressions, Improvements, Unchanged
implementation_notes: Header banner should be visually dominant
Consider confetti or celebration for passing (optional)
Regression banner should be impossible to miss
